name: Red goddess
blurb: Explore the mind of a goddess! An action and adventure metroidvania game brought to you by veterans from Deadlight, and CGI animation.

rewards.reward: No Reward

SUPER PAELLA-FALLAS TRIP ============================== For your generous pledge, WE WANT TO MEET YOU IN PERSON! You're welcome at our office in Valencia (Spain)  for THREE DAYS : You'll get a masterclass of 3D animation. You will be invited to development team to talk about the game, We'll take you out for a delicious meal "PAELLA"(the original one),Whew! (Travel and accommodations included--must be able to travel to VALENCIA-SPAIN. A maximum flight credit of $1000 will be issued. Any additional travel expenses are the responsibility of the backer ). You will be joining us at the FALLAS party (tipical regional party), too! . We'll make it some fun days! PLUS you'll receive 10 additional copies of the RED GODDESS to give to your family and friends. (Plus all previous reward tiers.),
